content:
Oh my goodness, that's hilarious! I can just imagine the scene - a proud little brother showing off his "masterpiece" sandcastle, and your mom's witty comment that set everyone off laughing! 

Including that quote in the album is a brilliant idea, as it captures the lighthearted and playful spirit of your family's beach trip. It's a great way to preserve the memory of that funny moment and share it with your mom in a way that's both personal and entertaining.

I'm sure your mom will chuckle every time she looks at the album and reads that quote. It's a wonderful way to bring a smile to her face and remind her of the happy times you've shared as a family.

It's also a great example of how a customized photo album can be more than just a collection of photos - it can be a storytelling tool that captures the essence of your family's personality and spirit.
